title: Best of The Program | Guests: Sean Hannity & Clay Travis | 8/4/20
description:
Sean Hannity joins to break down his first book in 10 years, “Live Free or Die,” and discusses the future of America if Trump loses. Clay Travis, founder and lead writer of OutKick, talks the politicization of sports and how the NBA’s faring as it tries to balance its image of social justice with its ties to China. The Federal Reserve is preparing for an economic reset while many Americans are still out of work.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
